Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Animation

  • public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Animation(int fr, java.lang.String[] frames)
      Initializes an Animation object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeScale(double proportion)
      Scales the images in the MayflowerImage[] frames to a double amount.

      Scales the images in the MayflowerImage[] frames to an int height and int width.
      void flipHorizontally()
      Flips the array of MayflowerImages array horizontally Precondition: MayflowerImage[] frames must be initialized Postcondition: Instance variable MayflowerImage[] frames is flipped horizontally.

      Returns the int frameRate of a given Animation object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animation

        public Animation(int fr,
                 java.lang.String[] frames)
        Initializes an Animation object. Precondition: Animation object must take an int fr and String[] frames. Postcondition: Instance variables int frameRate and MayflowerImage[] frames are initialized with int fr and (MayflowerImage) frames.length
        Parameters:
        fr - - int that initializes instance variable frameRate for Animation object
        frames - - length of String array initializes instance variable frame's length for Animation object

    • Method Detail

      • changeScale

        public void changeScale(double proportion)
        Scales the images in the MayflowerImage[] frames to a double amount. Precondition: changeScale method must take a double amount Postcondition: Instance variable MayflowerImage[] frames is scaled to double amount
        Parameters:
        amount - - double to be used as the actual paramater in the scale(double x) method

      • changeScale

        public void changeScale(int height,
                        int width)
        Scales the images in the MayflowerImage[] frames to an int height and int width. Precondition: changeScale method must take an int height and int width Postcondition: Instance variable MayflowerImage[] frames is scaled to an int height and int width
        Parameters:
        height - - int to fill height parameter in scale method
        width - - int to fill width parameter in scale method

      • flipHorizontally

        public void flipHorizontally()
        Flips the array of MayflowerImages array horizontally Precondition: MayflowerImage[] frames must be initialized Postcondition: Instance variable MayflowerImage[] frames is flipped horizontally.

      • getFrameRate

        public int getFrameRate()
        Returns the int frameRate of a given Animation object. Precondition: Animation object must be initialized. Postcondition: Returns int frameRate accessed from the Animation object.
        Returns:
        frameRate - the frameRate of the Animation object

      • getNextFrame

        public mayflower.MayflowerImage getNextFrame()
        Returns the MayflowerImage nextFrame of a given Animation object. Precondition: Animation object must be initialized. Postcondition: Returns currentFrame + 1 or MayflowerImage nextFrame of the given Animation object.
        Returns:
        nextFrame - the nextFrame of the current Animation object.

      • setBounds

        public void setBounds(int x,
                      int y,
                      int w,
                      int h)
        Sets the bounds for the Animation object by cropping variable MayflowerImage[] frames. Precondition: setBounds method must take an int x, int y, int w, and int h Postcondition: Animation object is cropped with values of int x, int y, int w, and int h
        Parameters:
        x - - int to fill x paramater in crop method
        y - - int to fill y paramater in crop method
        w - - int to fill w paramater in crop method
        h - - int to fill h paramater in crop method
